scripts.git:enforce-clean: git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo "\nERROR: Git working directory is not clean. Commit or stash your changes before proceeding.\n" && git status --short && exit 1)
scripts.dev:push: npm run validate-exports && npm run typecheck && npm run set-dev-env && npm run prepare-debug-version && bash clasp-wrapper.sh push -w
scripts.dev:pull: npm run set-dev-env && npm run prepare-debug-version && npm run clasp:pull
scripts.prod:push: npm run validate-exports && npm run typecheck && npm run set-prod-env && npm run git:enforce-clean && npm run prepare-prod-version && npm run clasp:push
scripts.prod:pull: npm run set-prod-env && npm run git:enforce-clean && npm run clasp:pull
